data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Granada.
In the minute 1, Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
Real Sociedad takes a corner from the left.
Real Sociedad are coming forward and Martin Zubimendi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Adnan Januzaj (Real Sociedad) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Granada have a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 10, Carlos Del Cerro Grande has awarded Real Sociedad a corner.
Real Sociedad's Adnan Januzaj is on target but unsuccessful.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Real Sociedad drives forward and Mikel Oyarzabal gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Real Sociedad drive forward but Mikel Oyarzabal is judged offside.
Throw-in for Granada close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad's Adnan Januzaj misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Granada at Reale Arena.
In the minute 19, Free kick Granada.
Mikel Merino is booked for the home team.
Yan Eteki is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 21, Yan Eteki is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
David Silva of Real Sociedad smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 22, Carlos Del Cerro Grande has awarded Real Sociedad a corner.
Nacho Monreal puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Granada's Roberto Soldado has run offside.
In the minute 24, Real Sociedad pushes forward through Mikel Oyarzabal, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Real Sociedad's Adnan Januzaj is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Real Sociedad drive upfield and Adnan Januzaj gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Mikel Oyarzabal.
In the minute 28, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
Granada needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Granada.
Real Sociedad takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 33, Granada have a goal kick.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada at Reale Arena.
In the minute 35, In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Granada to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in San Sebastian.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande has awarded Real Sociedad a corner.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Granada.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Jon Guridi is replacing Mikel Merino for the home team.
Dani Plomer is on a sub for Roberto Soldado for Granada.
The away team replace Robert Kenedy with Kingsley Fobi.
In the minute 47, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Granada a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Aritz Elustondo (Real Sociedad) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Granada throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
An attacking Real Sociedad player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Willian Jose (Real Sociedad) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 55, Real Sociedad are pushing forward but Mikel Oyarzabal's finish is wide of the goal.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Granada a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Granada throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
In the minute 55, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
David Silva of Real Sociedad gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 58, Granada have a goal kick.
David Silva of Real Sociedad gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
In the minute 61, Real Sociedad are coming forward and Nacho Monreal gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Granada at Reale Arena.
Real Sociedad make their second substitution with Igor Zubeldia replacing Joseba Zaldua.
In the minute 62, Real Sociedad make their third substitution with Portu replacing Adnan Januzaj.
The home team replace Mikel Oyarzabal with Martin Merquelanz.
Real Sociedad takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande has awarded Real Sociedad a corner.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jorge Molina for Granada who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 67, Ismael Ruiz Sanchez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Juan Ignacio Brunet Bordin is the substitute for Granada.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 69, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Granada's Jorge Molina is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 71, Real Sociedad pushes forward through Willian Jose, whose finish on goal is saved.
Real Sociedad takes a corner from the right.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Real Sociedad are pushing forward but Jon Guridi's finish is wide of the goal.
Granada have a goal kick.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 76, Jorge Molina (Granada) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alvaro Bravo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Aihen Munoz is on a sub for Nacho Monreal for Real Sociedad.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Granada.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Granada.
In the minute 80, Sergio Barcia (Granada) has received a first yellow card.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande has awarded Real Sociedad a corner.
Real Sociedad takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Granada at Reale Arena.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Granada.
In the minute 87, He's off! Robin Le Normand is shown a red card.
Granada's Darwin Machis misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Sociedad goal kick.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Granada.
Darwin Machis (Granada) has missed a penalty!
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
David Silva (Real Sociedad) gets a yellow card.
